Cai Cosmetics Gel Eyeliner & Brush 2-Piece Set Stay All Day Waterproof (Brown) Cai Cosmetics New York {'Brand': 'Cai Cosmetics New York', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1 x 1 inches; 0.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '844952182489'} It stays put..except 4 it dries out 2 fast..other than that..I would of gave it 5 🌟 Overallll greatttt product).. 48 Pairs Eyebrow Stencils Templates Shaping Eyebrow Stencils and 3 Pieces Eyebrow Razors Eyebrow Shavers for Women Makeup Tools Blulu {} Pretty neat & luv the ways 2 help U2 do ur brows these days👍 It helps very much:) Magnetic Eyeliner and Eyelash Kit Natural Look Waterproof and Smudge Resistant No Glue Easier To Use Than Traditional Magnetic Eyelashes ALICROWN HAIR {'Package Dimensions': '4.49 x 2.4 x 0.79 inches; 1.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '734830079171'} The only reason 4 four stars, is the band on the lashes seem a lil 2 thick, the lashes themselves seem normal & nice👌 Nice & ok😀 Handcrafted Angled, Winged Eye Brush. One Touch Cat Eye - UNDONE BEAUTY Eye Shadow + Liner Brush. For Precise Outer Eye & Lash Line Definition. Soft & Durable Bristles. Vegan & Cruelty Free. UNDONE BEAUTY {'Brand': 'UNDONE BEAUTY', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow', 'Material': 'synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.13 x 0.38 x 0.31 inches', 'Item Weight': '0.04 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.13 x 0.38 x 0.31 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'Item model number': '93157', 'UPC': '087327004720'} Soo LOVELY & PERFECT (especially 4 beginners✌) 2 do ur crease/it takes the guess work out of it:)👍

profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Product Preference:** The user maintains a strong interest in cosmetics, particularly enjoying functional and user-friendly tools that enhance makeup application. Their recent purchase highlights a continued focus on effective products that simplify beauty routines while offering a natural finish.

- **Rating Tendencies:** The user's tendency to give high ratings, notably a perfect five-star assessment for their latest purchase, underscores their appreciation for products that meet or exceed expectations. This reflects a consistent inclination to prioritize performance and quality.

- **Brand Affinity:** The user is drawn to innovative brands that prioritize quality and functionality in their offerings. Their positive feedback indicates a growing enthusiasm for brands that deliver effective solutions, particularly those that cater to specific skin needs, reaffirming their quest for reliable beauty tools.

- **Overall Behavior:** The latest interaction showcases the user’s supportive and excited approach towards brands that excel in practicality and effectiveness. Their enthusiastic review indicates a belief in the brand's potential for broader product offerings, aligning with their desire for continuous improvement in their beauty regimen. This trend of exploring new, high-quality tools reinforces their commitment to finding stylish and effective solutions for their beauty needs.
